item.title: Google .dev Domains, GitHub Pages, and Heroku Apps
item.author: shadowimmage@gmail.com (Chase Sawyer)
item.description: At the end of February 2019, Google released general access to the .dev top level domain. I had heard about this happening about a year ago, and am now the happy owner of two .dev domains! One of these is chasesawyer.dev and will soon be the new home of this site! But how to get it set up? When you buy a domain name, nothing is really set up for them - going to those addresses doesn’t point to anything Firefox and Google will just say “Server not found.
